trigger_prototype.name: Mapr: Configured and running services do not match on {#NODE}
Mapr: health is not OK on {#NODE}
Mapr: {#NODE} has full tasktracker local directory
Mapr: {#NODE} has less than 10% free memory

trigger.name: Mapr: Cluster cpu num utilization more than 90%
Mapr: Cluster cpu utilization more than 90%
Mapr: Cluster disk space utilization more than 90%
Mapr: Cluster map_tasks more than 90% of capacity
Mapr: Cluster memory utilization more than 90%
Mapr: Cluster number of disks changed
Mapr: Cluster reduce_tasks more than 90% of capacity
Mapr: Meprcli has a long timeout for getting info
Mapr: Monitors for Mapr does not work
Mapr: Query to Mapr does not work
